snippet.title: The Path | REMEMBER YOUR PATH | Link In Description
snippet.description:
Your objective is to remember the path game told you about 3 seconds then draw the path again (You can memorize it about 1 second and draw it)

Play this game NOW : http://adf.ly/PTkAd
Intro song : http://adf.ly/OLTYj 

Please give a feedback by comment below, rate and like this video!
Don't forget to subscribe me. Really helps me out ;)

Add me on Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/apit2010
